content: What's the reason WithStartNode is repeated in this trait declaration? Is this intentional? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/798446fe0612dd83a151e99c201b87dd649d4eb3/compiler/rustc_data_structures/src/graph/mod.rs#L63
After deleting the extra WithStartNode, x.py check runs successfully.
pierwill has marked this topic as unresolved.

After https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/87880 I've been thinking... is there a way to detect repeated trait bounds like these in general? Maybe as a lint? There's probably a naive way we could do this with grep and some regex. I was kind of surprised this is allowed!
